long_description: The Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate knife is the pinnacle of the Bear Grylls Survival series. Designed with direct input from Bear himself, this blade features innovations not found on other knives. Partially serrated blade is made of high carbon stainless steel for excellent edge retention. Stainless-steel pommel at the base of the handle is perfect for hammering. Whistle on lanyard cord comes in handy in emergencies. Rugged nylon sheath features a diamond sharpener, land-to-air rescue instructions and a flintlike ferrocerium fire-starter rod. The Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate knife comes with the.
short_description: The Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate knife is the pinnacle of the Bear Grylls Survival series. Designed with direct input from Bear himself, this blade features innovations not found on other knives.
